        "UI-Checkbox__root",\r
        "appearance-none peer block relative overflow-hidden transition h-5 w-5 shrink-0 text-white rounded-md ring-offset-1 border ring-offset-[--background]",\r
        "border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-700",\r

        "data-[state=unchecked]:bg-white dark:data-[state=unchecked]:bg-gray-700", // Unchecked\r
        "data-[state=unchecked]:hover:bg-gray-100 dark:data-[state=unchecked]:hover:bg-gray-600", // Unchecked hover\r
        "data-[state=checked]:bg-brand dark:data-[state=checked]:bg-brand data-[state=checked]:border-brand", // Checked\r
        "data-[state=indeterminate]:bg-[--muted] dark:data-[state=indeterminate]:bg-gray-700 data-[state=indeterminate]:text-white data-[state=indeterminate]:border-transparent", // Checked\r

    ], {\r
        variants: {\r
            size: {\r
                md: "h-5 w-5",\r
                lg: "h-6 w-6",\r
            },\r
        },\r
        defaultVariants: {\r
            size: "md",\r
        },\r
    }),\r
    label: cva([\r
        "UI-Checkbox_label",\r
        "font-normal",\r
        "data-[disabled=true]:opacity-50",\r
    ], {\r
        variants: {\r
            size: {\r
                md: "text-md",\r
                lg: "text-lg",\r
            },\r
        },\r
        defaultVariants: {\r
            size: "md",\r
        },\r
    }),\r
    indicator: cva([\r
        "UI-Checkbox__indicator",\r
        "flex h-full w-full items-center justify-center relative",\r
    ]),\r
    checkIcon: cva("UI-Checkbox__checkIcon absolute", {\r
        variants: {\r
            size: {\r
                md: "h-4 w-4",\r
                lg: "h-5 w-5",\r
            },\r
        },\r
        defaultVariants: {\r
            size: "md",\r
        },\r
    }),\r
